desc: Send hugs by post to cheer someone up with a gorgeous 'Box of Hugs’ gift. A great alternative to flowers, these lovely hug in a box gift hampers are full of treats and a personalised card to let someone know you're thinking of them. Perfect 'Thinking of you' gifts, 'get well soon' gifts and 'Birthday gifts.' Next Day.

layout.text: Gift boxes that deliver your HUGS when you can't be there xox
